# testdata

Words were taken from
[most-common-words-by-language](https://github.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/tree/master/src/resources).
Following newlines were removed. Languages that were poorly translated or did
not exist were replaced with translations from `english.txt`. These may contain
English words that could not be translated.

```bash
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/arabic.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/armenian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/basque.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/catalan.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/danish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/dutch.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/english.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/finnish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/french.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/german.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/german2.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/greek.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/hindi.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/hungarian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/indonesian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/irish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/italian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/kraaij_pohlmann.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/lithuanian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/lovins.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/mod.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/nepali.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/norwegian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/porter.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/portuguese.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/romanian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/russian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/serbian.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/spanish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/swedish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/tamil.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/turkish.txt; wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/oprogramador/most-common-words-by-language/master/src/resources/yiddish.txt
```
